column1: '''Isaac Charles Singleton, Jr.''' (born [[August]], [[1967]]) is an American actor. Some of his more recognized roles are Bo'Sun in ''[[wikipedia:Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
column2: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl]]'' and the vampire Ingonito in ''[[wikipedia:Hellsing (TV series)
column3: Hellsing]]''. As such, he has played opposite both [[Orlando Bloom]] (Will Turner in ''Pirates'') and Bloom's voice double [[Crispin Freeman]] (Alucard in ''Hellsing'').

column1: * [[2006]]: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth II]]'': [[Lurtz]]
* [[2004]]: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth]]'': [[Lurtz]]
